ygData.subject: IMPORTANT!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Info on happy99.exe This is the result of the Mcaffee scan.  I ve forwarded the e-mail to onelist, hotmail, and my ISP so hopefully someone will do something
ygData.messageBody:
Info on happy99.exe

This is the result of the Mcaffee scan. I've forwarded the e-mail to
onelist, hotmail, and my ISP so hopefully someone will do something besides
ban him. That is all.


There is no cure available for the virus on the file Happy99.exe.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS FILE TO YOUR COMPUTER!

Contact the originator of the file, inform them the file contains
a virus and ask them to send a virus-free version of the file.

While it still may be possible to download this attachment,
Hotmail strongly recommends you do not do so.


It contains a win32/skaworm virus


_______________________________________________________________
